verses.1: Topa aw, a hoihin gamta-in Topa hong muang ka hih manin, ka thutanna hong lak in.
verses.2: Topa aw, hong ze-et inla hong sin in. Ka lungsim le ka ngaihsutna hong en tel in.
verses.3: Bang hang hiam cih leh na itna kip in lam hong lak a, nangma tungah citakin ka gamta hi.
verses.4: Mikhialte tawh tukhawm loin, thusim neite tawh ka kipawl kei hi.
verses.5: Siatna a bawl mite ka mudah a, migilote tawh ka tukhawm kei hi.
verses.6: Topa aw, mawh baan lohna ka lahna-in ka khutte ka sil a, biakna pia-in na biakna tau kiim ah ka pai hi.
verses.7: Lungdamkohna la a gingin sa-in, nangma nasep a lamdangte ka gen kawm hi.
verses.8: Topa aw, nangma inn-a ten ding le na minthang a omna munah om ding ka ut hi.
verses.9: Mimawhte, mi that nuamte, siatna a bawl mite, le golhguk a la nuamte tawh kei hong susia khawm kei in.
verses.11: Ahih hangin kei ka hih leh, ka hoih gamtat hi. Hong hehpih inla, kei hong hon khia in.
verses.12: Leizang munah ka ding hi. Mihon tampi lakah Topa ka phat ding hi.
